details.message: Reference Id /subscriptions//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups/RG-PaulJonesMC-uks/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/PJ-VNET-NorthEurope-2-AppGW-SN is not formatted correctly. The Id is expected to reference resources of type virtualNetworks/subnets. Path properties.gatewayIPConfigurations[0].properties.subnet.
Value of id property has to start with '/subscriptions/'. Provided value doesn't: PJ-pip-NorthEurope-2. Path properties.frontendIPConfigurations[0].properties.publicIPAddress.

Reference Id /subscriptions//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups/RG-PaulJonesMC-uks/providers/Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/PJ-AppGW-NorthEurope-2/frontendIPConfigurations/FE01 is not formatted correctly. The Id is expected to reference resources of type applicationGateways/frontendIPConfigurations. Path properties.httpListeners[0].properties.frontendIPConfiguration.

Reference Id /subscriptions//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups/RG-PaulJonesMC-uks/providers/Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/PJ-AppGW-NorthEurope-2/frontendPorts/HTTP is not formatted correctly. The Id is expected to reference resources of type applicationGateways/frontendPorts. Path properties.httpListeners[0].properties.frontendPort.

The Id is expected to reference resources of type applicationGateways/httpListeners. Path properties.requestRoutingRules[0].properties.httpListener.

The Id is expected to reference resources of type applicationGateways/backendAddressPools. Path properties.requestRoutingRules[0].properties.backendAddressPool.

Reference Id /subscriptions//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups//subscriptions/f0cc1032-d31b-4e08-81d9-7e97d4223735/resourceGroups/RG-PaulJonesMC-uks/providers/Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/PJ-AppGW-NorthEurope-2/backendHttpSettingsCollection/-BE_HTTP is not formatted correctly.
